name: Relocation (dpbetter2000)
description:
George the brown-headed spider monkey has been displaced from his home by deforestation.

Swinging on vines to navigate his way through the jungle, he struggles to find food and survive on his journey to find a new home. Relocation is a  platforming adventure focused on challenging jumps and timing.

Credits:

Base Code by Michael Baker

Assets by Szadi Art
